settings.heading: International Wedding Day Festival - 1/12/2025
settings.row_content:
Join us at the vibrant International Wedding Day Festival—a celebration of love, culture, and all things weddings! This dazzling event brings together couples, families, and wedding enthusiasts from around the globe to explore unique traditions, discover the latest trends, and meet top industry vendors. Be sure to visit our booth, where we’ll showcase an exquisite collection of wedding dresses designed to make your big day unforgettable. Don't miss this one-of-a-kind experience!

Buy Tickets:

https://www.internationalweddingfestival.com/sacramento-bridal-show

settings.heading: Maggie Sottero Event - 1/10/2025 - 1/19/2025
settings.row_content:
Don’t miss our exclusive Maggie Sottero Event, where elegance and romance come to life! For a limited time, explore a stunning selection of brand-new gowns from this iconic designer, featuring timeless silhouettes, intricate details, and unparalleled craftsmanship. Plus, enjoy 5% off your dream dress and receive a $200 accessory credit—making veils up to $200 absolutely free! This is your chance to say "yes" to the dress and the perfect finishing touch. Book your appointment today to take advantage of these limited-time offers!

Schedule:

settings.heading: Kitty Chen Trunk Show 1/17/2025 - 1/26/2025
settings.row_content:
Be the first to experience the breathtaking 2025 Kitty Chen Collection at our exclusive trunk show! Discover stunning new designs that combine modern glamour with timeless elegance. For a limited time, enjoy 10% off your dream gown and a $100 accessory credit, perfect for veils, headpieces, belts, and more. Elevate your bridal look and make your big day unforgettable. Appointments are filling quickly—reserve yours today to take advantage of these special offers!

Schedule:

settings.heading: Reno Grand Bridal Showcase - 2/2/2025
settings.row_content:
We’re excited to be part of the Reno Grand Bridal Showcase this year! Join us for this premier wedding event, where you’ll find inspiration, connect with top wedding professionals, and discover everything you need to create your perfect day. Stop by our booth to explore our stunning collection of wedding gowns and learn about our exclusive offers. Let us help you say “yes” to the dress of your dreams!

Buy Tickets:

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/reno-grand-bridal-showcase-tickets-1118119939839

settings.heading: Pollardi & Ariamo Event 1/31/2025 - 2/9/2025
settings.row_content:

Explore their latest collections, featuring bold designs, intricate details, and luxurious fabrics that will take your breath away. For a limited time, enjoy 5% off your dream gown and a $200 accessory credit, perfect for veils, headpieces, and more. Don’t miss this opportunity to find a gown that’s as unique and stunning as your love story. Book your appointment today to take advantage of these exclusive offers!

settings.row_content:

Explore gowns that blend elegance, style, and sophistication, and take advantage of our exclusive event offers: 5% off your dream dress and a $200 accessory credit for veils, headpieces, and more. Don’t miss this winning opportunity to find your perfect gown—book your appointment today and score big on bridal style!
